Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_components

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_components.CharacterCard
public class CharacterCard extends Object
Class that describes the CharacterCard as a game object, with methods to get information about it and to update its status.

    • getStorageCapacity

      public int getStorageCapacity()
      Returns the storage capacity of the Character of the CharacterCard (the number of StudentDiscs the CharacterCard must have after the Setup and when the Character action ends)
      Returns:
      the storage capacity of the Character of the CharacterCard

    • getStudentsStorage

      public ArrayList<StudentDisc> getStudentsStorage()
      Returns an ArrayList with the students the Storage of the card contains
      Returns:
      an ArrayList with the students the Storage of the card contains

    • addStudentToStorage

      public void addStudentToStorage(StudentDisc studentDisc) throws CharacterStudentsStorageFull
      Adds the passed StudentDisc to the CharacterCard storage. I can't add anything if the Card capacity is reached.
      Parameters:
      studentDisc - the StudentDisc to add to the Card
      Throws:
      CharacterStudentsStorageFull - if the CharacterCard already has reached its storage capacity and can't accept any other StudentDisc

    • removeStudentFromStorage

      public StudentDisc removeStudentFromStorage(int studentToRemove) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes from the storage the requested StudentDisc looking for its id.
      Parameters:
      studentToRemove - the id of the StudentDisc to remove
      Returns:
      the removed StudentDisc
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the requested Student is not in the CharacterCard stograge

    • getAction

      public Action getAction() throws ActionNotSetException
      Returns the Action of this CharacterCard if available.
      Returns:
      the Action of this CharacterCard
      Throws:
      ActionNotSetException - if the Action was not set by setAction(Action)

    • setAction

      public void setAction(Action action)
      Sets the Action for the CharacterCard. This Action is already configured by CharacterManager and SetupAction.
      Parameters:
      action - the Action to set

    • setAsUsed

      public void setAsUsed()
      Sets the CharacterCard as used so the next time the Card cost will be higher (only for the first time).

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns the cost of the CharacterCard checking if the Card has already been used.
      Returns:
      the cost of the CharacterCard
